ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: CONTAINS(Coverages__c, "Employment Practices Liability Insurance") && Premium__c < 2500 && CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Scale') && ISChanged( Status__c ) && TEXT(Status__c) == 'Received'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Can not change Status to Received If Policy is less than 2500 and contains Employment Practices Liability coverage
